ygData.subject: hate plane
ygData.msgSnippet: its official, even dark elves who worship innoruuk are KoS in the plane of hate ;p WHY IS THIS? its not bad enough that evil folks now have to deal with ha
ygData.messageBody:
its official, even dark elves who worship innoruuk are KoS in the plane of
hate ;p WHY IS THIS? its not bad enough that evil folks now have to deal
with "ha ha, i killed your god" but he actually attacks his own if we go
there! things are becoming quite frustrating for people who want to play an
evil character in this game..

when they bring up the plane of air and karana is in it, he'd better damn
well be KoS to paladins, rangers, and druids who worship him ;p

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
